title: Full-Stack Web Developer
responsibilities: Delivered responsive web applications using modern full-stack frameworks
Built custom admin dashboards for content and operations management
Coordinated with stakeholders to define scope and milestones
achievements: Launched multiple client projects on schedule
Improved page performance through optimized rendering
Reduced support requests with clearer UI workflows
Automated content updates to minimize manual effort

title: Product Designer
responsibilities: Conducted user research and synthesized insights
Designed high-fidelity UI prototypes and design systems
Optimized information architecture for web and mobile
Partnered with engineering to validate feasibility
achievements: Shortened onboarding flows with clearer IA
Created a reusable design system adopted across teams
Improved usability test scores through iterative design
Aligned stakeholders with visual prototypes and evidence

career_transition.reason: Why I Transitioned from Design to Development
career_transition.details: After working in product design, I pursued full-stack development to deliver end-to-end experiences and preserve design intent.
